subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy produced the best round of the day, a seven-under-par 65, but Bubba Watson’s 67 was enough to keep him atop the W.G.C.-Cadillac Championship leader board.
snippet: Rory McIlroy produced the best round of the day, a seven-under-par 65, but Bubba Watson’s 67 was enough to keep him atop the W.G.C.-Cadillac Championship leader board.
